name: Chrome Extension Management & Control Center
description: Build comprehensive extension management system in GAIA Dashboard - deploy updates, monitor health, manage permissions, stream logs

critical_issues.title: Multi-machine extension management
critical_issues.description: Currently managing extensions via SSH/SCP - need centralized dashboard control

critical_issues.title: Extension health monitoring
critical_issues.description: No visibility into WebSocket status, message queues, or service worker health

critical_issues.title: Real-time debugging
critical_issues.description: Cannot see extension logs without SSH access - need streaming console

critical_issues.title: Version control & rollback
critical_issues.description: No way to track extension versions or quickly rollback failed deployments

critical_issues.title: Permission management
critical_issues.description: Cannot edit manifest permissions via UI - requires code changes

deliverables.name: Extension Status Dashboard
deliverables.description: Real-time status widget showing all machines, versions, WebSocket status

deliverables.name: File Management System
deliverables.description: Upload, version, and deploy extension files via dashboard

deliverables.name: Real-time Logs Viewer
deliverables.description: Stream service worker console output with filtering and search

deliverables.name: Permission Editor
deliverables.description: Visual UI to edit manifest permissions without code changes

deliverables.name: Settings Configurator
deliverables.description: Dashboard UI to adjust extension settings (WebSocket URL, intervals, etc)

deliverables.name: Machine Registry
deliverables.description: Database tables for tracking machines, versions, deployments

deliverables.name: Deployment API
deliverables.description: REST endpoints for file sync, deployment, rollback, logs

deliverables.name: Integration Tests
deliverables.description: Test multi-machine deployment, log streaming, permission changes

success_criteria: Dashboard shows extension status for all machines
Can deploy files to machines via UI (no SSH needed)
Real-time log streaming works with filtering
Version history tracked with rollback capability
Permission editor allows manifest changes without code
Settings configurator updates extension behavior dynamically
Machine registry auto-discovers extensions via heartbeat
Deployment API provides REST interface for all operations
Can manage 10+ machines from single dashboard
queue_command: os: Build Chrome Extension Management System for GAIA Dashboard --priority 7
notes: This project solves the multi-machine extension management problem. Currently using SSH/SCP for updates which is error-prone and doesn't scale. Dashboard control provides centralized management, real-time monitoring, and automated deployments.
